author: captainvideo
post: “I believe that it doesn’t matter whether the shroud is actual or not. Even if it’s not real, if it can bring some kindness and peace to today’s human race, then there is no harm believing in it.” That is nonesense. Truth matters, and faith in something that is not true is an abomination. The image shure looks like a photograhic negative, and the claim that it was made using some kind of photographic process cannot be so easily be dismissed in light of the fact that it has been proven that such an image can indeed be produced using such a process. If the cloth had been wrapped around a face of a person, the image when the cloth is laid flat, would have been widened and not have the proper proportions..
title: Shroud of Turin Opinion
